resources.string: Automatically switch to a preferred network when both Wi-Fi network and mobile network are available.
When a Wi-Fi network is detected to have poor connection quality, mobile network will be used instead. When turned off, Wi-Fi connection will be prioritized.

Predict network conditions by analyzing Wi-Fi signal data. If poor Wi-Fi network quality is expected, this will automatically switch to a mobile network. Wi-Fi connection will be prioritized for home network use.
